name: Jessica Jones
summary: 自从短暂的超级英雄生涯悲剧收场后，杰西卡·琼斯成为了纽约地狱厨房地区暴躁、尖刻的私家侦探，开始重塑自己的生活和事业。但由于深受严重的创伤后应激障碍的影响，杰西卡需要对抗外压、战胜心魔，必要时还得用到她那非凡的能力……尤其当她的生命受到威胁时。
info:
• 中文名: 杰茜卡·琼斯
  • 原作: Brian Michael Bendis、Michael Gaydos《Jessica Jones 》、Marvel Entertainment
  • 主演: Krysten Ritter、David Tennant、Mike Colter、Rachael Taylor、Carrie-Anne Moss、Eka Darville、Erin Moriarty、Wil Traval
  • 制作: Netflix
  • 集数: 13
  • 开始: 2015-11-20
  • 类型: Action、Adventure、Superhero
  • 国家/地区: 美国
  • 每集长: 60m
  • 频道: Netflix
  • 首播国家: 美国
  • imdb_id: tt2357547
  • 发行: Melissa Rosenberg
  • 执行制作: Melissa Rosenberg、Jeph Loeb
  • 制作公司: Marvel Television、ABC Studios

eps.name: AKA Ladies Night
eps.desc: Jessica Jones is hired to find a pretty NYU student who's vanished, but it turns out to be more than a simple missing persons case.

eps.name: AKA Crush Syndrome
eps.desc: Jessica vows to prove Hope's innocence, even though it means tracking down a terrifying figure from her own past.

eps.name: AKA It's Called Whiskey
eps.desc: It won't be easy to acquire or deploy. but Jessica thinks she's found a weapon to use against Kilgrave. Luke and Jessica bond over their similarities.

eps.name: AKA 99 Friends
eps.desc: A new case demands attention as Jessica tries to find out who's spying on her for Kilgrave. Trish's radio show yields unexpected consequences.

eps.name: AKA The Sandwich Saved Me
eps.desc: Despite Jessica's objections, Trish's new friend Simpson gets involved in the hunt for Kilgrave. Jessica recalls a pivotal moment in her life.

eps.name: AKA You're a Winner!
eps.desc: Luke hires Jessica to help him find someone who may have skipped town, but she fears he'll learn too much about her history in the process.

eps.name: AKA Top Shelf Perverts
eps.desc: Malcom, Simpson and Trish go rouge to prevent Jessica from carrying out an extreme plan to outwit Kilgrave.

eps.name: AKA WWJD?
eps.desc: Jessica experiences a strange homecoming courtesy of Kilgrave. Hograth's conflict with her estranged wife reaches a tipping point.

eps.name: AKA Sin Bin
eps.desc: Just when Jessica has Kilgrave right where she want's him. Hogarth's involvement complicates the situation. Details of Kilgrave's past emerge.

eps.name: AKA 1,000 Cuts
eps.desc: A discovery has the potential to change the entire game -- if Jessica can refuse Kilgrave's offer.

eps.name: AKA I've Got the Blues
eps.desc: Jessica searches morgues for clues. Trish goes all out to keep Simpson from getting in Jessica's way. Malcom has an epiphany.

eps.name: AKA Take a Bloody Number
eps.desc: The hunt for Kilgrave reunites Jessica with Luke. Trish receives some unexpected information about Simpson and Jessica.

eps.name: AKA Smile
eps.desc: Jessica and Luke get help from someone else in the neighborhood. Kilgrave gears up for a major test of powers against Jessica.
